website_summaries.verdict: A substantial and healthy snack made with real meat and 100% natural ingredients.
pros: No grains, gluten, corn, wheat, or soy fillers
For dogs of all sizes and breeds
No chicken or poultry by-product meals
cons: Dense and difficult to break with your hands

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. We switched from Milkbones to these, because they are healthier. I get them in all the flavors. They are cheaper on Amazon in bulk, than any other way or store.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Healthy bites!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love all things salmon - these are tasty (per three dog reviews - beagle, Bichon, dachshund!), crunchy enough to help keep teeth clean, and reasonably priced. We break them for the small dogs, and even for our 9 month old rescue kitten!
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Shiba Inu Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Verified Purchase My Shiba Inu has many food allergies. This is one of the few treats she is able to eat that contains not one thing she is allergic to. She likes them and we are happy. Just wish we had more options for her. But we are happy there is a store bought option for her. Because her dog food we make fresh for her because it is impossible to find a raw dog food that doesn’t have anything that’s on her allergies list.
customer_reviews.author: D from Shallow D'Lights

customer_reviews.title: Superior ingredients are used
customer_reviews.text: We have two small rescue dogs that have been getting this biscuit for as long as we have had them. Three years, now and they start the day with one each after their morning walk. We do not give them soft food or treats for protection of their teeth. Small dogs have problems with tooth tartar and this product really helps. Blue Wilderness products are as healthy as you can buy. Superior ingredients are used.
customer_reviews.author: DER

customer_reviews.title: dog loves em.
customer_reviews.text: my dog is a crackhead for these things. I literally get growled at at least once or twice a day until I stuff one of these buggers into her Kong.
customer_reviews.author: buckly

customer_reviews.title: No longer 'Made in USA'?
customer_reviews.text: Packaging no longer indicates where product is made or ingredients sourced (other than "Made with USA Duck").
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love Blue Wilderness Duck biscuits
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these duck biscuits! Local store was sold out but found them on Amazon in a multi pack of 6. Not available in 1 pack. Have tried other flavors and they are ok - duck is most preferred by German Shepherd and Australian Shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: PhyllisO

customer_reviews.title: Blue Wilderness Biscuits Rock!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these. I know they are good for them and that the quality is there. Blue Wilderness anything is good for my dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Old Doc

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: These must taste great because my dog goes crazy for them. He’s a golden who is a very picky eater so I can’t give him more than one or he will push his food aside waiting for another.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these!! They simply can't get enough of them. Doesn't matter what flavor I buy, they eat them right up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Norton

customer_reviews.title: We love this treat for our dog, and so does he.
customer_reviews.text: They always arrive promptly and in good condition. A healthy great treat for you pet!
customer_reviews.author: ShortStuff

customer_reviews.title: I buy for the nutritional value
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my neighbor's dog to provide him attention, praise, and good nutrition. Excellent quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them! I only feed my dogs Blue Buffalo ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them! I only feed my dogs Blue Buffalo food and treats with great results
customer_reviews.author: Steel Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh well, my GSD is very picky and he loves this one...
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: My little guy loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My little Chorkie loves the Blue Wilderness brand, one bag of this last so long as well. Highly recommended to any dog owner
customer_reviews.author: Tylerson Baefire Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves the taste of this flavor more than others.
customer_reviews.author: JH_VA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and I like that they are grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Henderson

customer_reviews.title: treats
customer_reviews.text: Want to give quality to dog. You pay alot as far as cheap stuff but buy good products like this one. You don't skimp on yours. don't skimp on theirs .
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them. I have small dogs so I break them into small pieces. They are easy to break.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Picky puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got a new puppy who is very particular about his treats, but he always gobbles these down without pause.
customer_reviews.author: Vulcan

product_meta.title: BLUE Wilderness Grain Free Biscuits Crunchy Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Rocky Mountain Recipe Red Meat| Size:8 oz (6 Pack)| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIn celebration of the spirit of the wolf that has roamed the American West for centuries, These delicious baked Biscuits feature more of the Red meat your dog craves with an irresistible crunch he can’t resist. Like all BLUE Wilderness foods, wilderness Biscuits are 100% grain-free so your dog can enjoy a high-protein treat without any of the grains that contain gluten.
feature_bullets: Made With The Finest Natural Ingredients
